posts.title: How to get experience?
posts.content: The only source of knowledge is experience.
posts.author: Albert Einstein

posts.title: New frontiers
posts.content: That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.
posts.author: Neil Armstrong

posts.title: About life
posts.content: Life's not about how hard of a hit you can give... it's about how many you can take, and still keep moving forward.
posts.author: Rock Balboa
